author: Vertyco
description: Generate and edit images using OpenAI's GPT-Image models. Supports turn-based image editing, reference images, and per-role access control with cooldowns.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user cooldown timestamps for rate limiting purposes. This data can be deleted upon request.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing ImGen!

To get started:
1. Have a server admin run `/imgen api` to configure the OpenAI API key
2. Optionally set up role-based access with `/imgen access`
3. Use `/makeimage` to generate images or `/editimage` to edit existing ones

Note: Each server needs its own OpenAI API key.
short: Generate and edit images with OpenAI's GPT-Image models
